verses.verse: The <S%H4633>plans<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%> belong to <S%H120>man,<s%> but the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
All the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H2134>clean<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H7307>motives.<s%>
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> your <S%H4639>deeds<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and your <S%H4284>plans<s%> shall <S%H3559>succeed.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6466>made<s%> everything for its own <S%H4617>end<s%>â€” <S%H7563>yes,<s%> even the wicked for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7563>evil.<s%>
Everyone who is <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> they <S%H3027>shall<s%> <S%H3027>certainly<s%> not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
By <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H3722>atoned<s%> <S%H3374>for.<s%> By the fear of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> men <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
When a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H7521>please<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he makes even his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to be at peace with <S%H7999>him.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> than <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H8393>revenues<s%> with <S%H4941>injustice.<s%>
A <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2803>plans<s%> his <S%H1870>course,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3559>directs<s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
Inspired <S%H7081>judgments<s%> are on the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%> He <S%H4941>shall<s%> not <S%H4603>betray<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H4941>Honest<s%> <S%H3976>balances<s%> and <S%H6425>scales<s%> are <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s; all the <S%H68>weights<s%> in the <S%H3599>bag<s%> are his <S%H4639>work.<s%>
It is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7562>wrong,<s%> for the <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
<S%H6664>Righteous<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H7522>delight<s%> of <S%H4428>kings.<s%> They <S%H157>value<s%> one who <S%H1696>speaks<s%> the <S%H3477>truth.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2534>wrath<s%> is a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of <S%H4194>death,<s%> but a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will pacify <S%H3722>it.<s%>
In the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H2416>life.<s%> His <S%H6440>favor<s%> is like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of the spring <S%H4456>rain.<s%>

How much <S%H2896>better<s%> it is to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> than <S%H2742>gold!<s%> <S%H7069>Yes,<s%> to get <S%H998>understanding<s%> is to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> rather than <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
The <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%> He who <S%H5341>keeps<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
<S%H1347>Pride<s%> goes <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction,<s%> and a <S%H1363>haughty<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H3783>fall.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to be of a <S%H6035>lowly<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with the <S%H8217>poor,<s%> than to <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>plunder<s%> with the <S%H1343>proud.<s%>
He who <S%H7919>heeds<s%> the <S%H1697>Word<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H2896>prosperity.<s%> Whoever <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H835>blessed.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H995>prudent.<s%> <S%H4986>Pleasantness<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3254>promotes<s%> <S%H3948>instruction.<s%>
<S%H7922>Understanding<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> to one who <S%H1167>has<s%> <S%H4148>it,<s%> but the punishment of <S%H191>fools<s%> is their <S%H200>folly.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H7919>instructs<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3254>adds<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%> to his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H5278>Pleasant<s%> <S%H561>words<s%> are a <S%H6688>honeycomb,<s%> <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H4832>health<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> which seems <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> but in the <S%H319>end<s%> it <S%H1870>leads<s%> to <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The appetite of the <S%H6001>laboring<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H6001>labors<s%> for <S%H6310>him;<s%> for his mouth urges him <S%H404>on.<s%>
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3738>devises<s%> <S%H7451>mischief.<s%> His <S%H8193>speech<s%> is like a <S%H6867>scorching<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>
A <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>stirs<s%> up <S%H4066>strife.<s%> A <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> <S%H6504>separates<s%> close <S%H441>friends.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H6601>entices<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H3212>leads<s%> him in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>

One who <S%H6095>winks<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H2803>plot<s%> <S%H8419>perversities,<s%> one who <S%H7169>compresses<s%> his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> is <S%H3615>bent<s%> <S%H3615>on<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Gray <S%H7872>hair<s%> is a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory.<s%> It is <S%H4672>attained<s%> by a <S%H1870>life<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

One who is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1368>mighty;<s%> one who <S%H4910>rules<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> than he who <S%H3920>takes<s%> a <S%H5892>city.<s%>
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> is <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H2436>lap,<s%> but its every <S%H4941>decision<s%> is from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
